name: Double Sided: War for Fun and Profit
name_original: Double Sided: War for Fun and Profit
description:
Play both sides in this 2D shoot 'em up! Scrap enemy ships with your salvage gun, then switch sides to keep the battle going long enough to get your fill of loot!

Be careful - if one side is destroyed or overwhelms the other, you can't salvage any more scrap! You can see their relative strength at the top of the screen. Switch sides to keep the battle even. While you are swapping, you are vulnerable to both sides!

Enemies that make it to the other side of the screen will weaken the opposing side without you gaining salvage!

WASD or left joystick to move

Space or A to shoot

Shift or B to swap sides

ESC to quit.
